entry.summary:
Vendor: Climax
Type: Vibrators – Battery Operated
Price: 28.98

Product Description:
  • Climax Spinner is a gyrating rabbit-style vibrator
  • 4.5 insertable inches (11.4 cm) and 1.4 inches (3.5 cm) of girth
  • Made of soft TPR material that feels incredible against your skin
  • Unique rotating tip swoops in and hits all the right spots
  • 6 awe-inspiring functions of vibration and pulsation give you a wealth of options
  • LED lights help navigate controls in the dark
  • Press the power button to start the vibration, press the F button to select the desired pattern of vibration
  • Phthalate free
  • Requires 4 AAA batteries (not included)


Item Dimensions:
Insertable Inches: 4.5 in. (11.43 cm)
Item Width: 2.25 in. (5.72 cm)
Item Height: 9 in. (22.86 cm)
Item Depth: 1.4 in. (3.56 cm)
Item Weight: 0.085 lb (0.039 kg)

Package Dimensions:
Package Width: 6.25 in. (15.88 cm)
Package Height: 11 in. (27. 94 cm)
Package Depth: 2 in. (5.08 cm)
Package Weight: 0.11 lb (0.049 kg)

Materials:
TPR
ABS Plastic
